introduction.text: Welcome to Personal Assistant, your all-in-one solution for managing your daily tasks efficiently. Our application offers the following features:

address_book.text: Address Book: Keep track of all your contacts in one place. Easily add, edit, and manage your contacts with a few clicks.

note_organiser.text: Note Organiser: Organise your thoughts, ideas, and to-dos with our powerful note management system. Create, edit, and categorise your notes for better productivity.

file_repository.text: File Repository: Store and manage your important files securely. Upload, categorise, and access your files from anywhere, anytime.

daily_news_summary.text: Daily News Summary: Stay informed with the latest updates in your chosen areas of interest. Get daily news summaries, weather, and exchange rates updates directly within the app.
